name: baubau
description: xivic's plugin marketplace for development workflow automation

plugins.name: gitlab-collaboration
plugins.description: Complete GitLab workflow automation plugin for team collaboration. Automates issue creation, branch management, and merge request workflows with interactive questions or JSON file input.

plugins.name: business-doc-maker
plugins.description: Business document (Business Scenario/Test Case) generation and analysis plugin. Creates structured requirement documents in JSON schema, analyzes implementation gaps by comparing with codebase, and automatically generates actionable development plans.
